reviews.text: The food is always fresh, the staff are super friendly, and it‚Äôs just steps away from Brooklyn College, perfect for a quick bite between classes. Their sandwiches and wraps are packed with flavor, and the prices are great for the quality. It‚Äôs become my go to spot whenever I‚Äôm around campus. Highly recommend to anyone nearby!
Great food! Fast service!! And extremely friendly staff! 100% recommend

Nicely located in the closed loop in Flatbush area, this corner deli serves up a variety of hot/cold sandwiches.

Go checkout the creative sandwiches with plenty of options like the Steph Curry, omelettes and breakfast burritos. I got the healthy breakfast burritos (egg whites, Turkey bacon, Swiss and home fries w/ ketchup). It was good and definitely some extra napkins as you devour it.

Will go back to try a different sandwich for sure. Make sure to check prices, they may have some incentives if using cash and watch out for addictives to pricing.

Definitely worth a check out if you‚Äôre in the area and just want a lot of options to choose from.

So disappointing. I ordered a beef burrito today. What they gave me was some chopped hamburger bs inside my burrito.  What's worse was the burrito was drowning in grease. I had to wipe it down before taking my first bite. 0/5 would recommend this place to anyone.
They definitely take advantage of these college kids. They be up charging from the original price it is. Plus they don‚Äôt even be saying how they charge extra with apply pay.
PESIMO CUSTOMER:  The Service  a terrible attitude, I do not recommend it at all, I will never come back. I do not recommend it at all.

THIS PLACE IS A SCAM!!!! I am a busy college student and have been a frequent customer since this place is very close and convenient. However, I have noticed patterns in which these people overcharge the food despite telling a different price on the menus. In addition, the food is not high quality nor do they meet the expectations as explicitly stated on the menu. I used to order the chicken cutlet sandwich and each time, they would skimp on the veggies especially avocado. Or shall I say barely. Then, today I ordered a grande breakfast burrito. The cashier said the total was $13.35. How do you go from $8.95 to $13?? So I asked her nicely, and she said the Chipotle mayo was an extra 50 cents, which is fine, but how is it still $13? The overcharge is insane. I went to eat my sandwich later and there was NOT EVEN CHIPOTLE MAYO. This is extremely upsetting. People deserve to get what they pay for and taking advantage of college students for extra money is completely immoral. Do not go to this place and take the extra step to go somewhere else where you‚Äôll be treated with respect.

The food is Okk and the customer service is bad the lady at the register is rude she got an attitude from me asking for the menu because it was my first time there. The chicken was very hard and I asked for it to be very tender, wouldn't recommend it to anyone first and last time going it just wasn't it for me
Thanks for having vegan options! The vegan sausage Italian sub is great

If I could give it 0 stars I would. Dudes working in the back angry at me because I asked for ketchup and mayo on my sandwich. Then I was overcharged on my meal. 12.38 dollars for a drink and chop cheese. They are scammers. He pressed the‚Ä¶

The food is okay but way too overpriced for the quality you actually get. Also not to mention that they up-charge people without warning. They have a policy written on their menu that breakfast goes up by a dollar starting at noon. I was in there at 11:07 and after I paid they said starting at 11 it‚Äôs an up charge even though it conflicts with what they advertise on the menu. When I expressed my concern they told me the menu wasn‚Äôt updated despite the fact that those are the menus they‚Äôre giving customers to look at and also that at the bottom it says prices may vary. But the lady at the register told me I was up charged because of the 11 am policy, which is no where in writing.  I feel bad for everyone else who bought breakfast there at 11 (which were a lot of people) because this business thinks they can get away with just calling out whatever price they feel like at the time. Completely unreliable and no integrity. And a business that relies on money from college kids. It‚Äôs just dishonest business. I liked the food okay but won‚Äôt be returning.

I come for the sandwiches! Fresh & delicious every single time. My go to is the Steph Curry w/ pepper jack cheese and extra chipotle aioli. Can‚Äôt go wrong with the flavor combo‚Äôs in this - Simply Superior!
